Name: ASP.Net
Description: ASP.NET Course: Learn how to build secure, scalable, and high-performance web applications and APIs using C# and ASP.NET Core, with hands-on experience in databases and backend development.

Name: Frontent Using Angular
Description: Frontend Using Angular: Learn how to build dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web applications using Angular, TypeScript, and modern frontend development practices.

Name: Odoo ERP System
Description: Odoo ERP System: Learn how to use and customize Odoo ERP to manage business processes efficiently, including sales, accounting, inventory, HR, and CRM in an integrated system.

Name: PHP Laravel
Description: PHP Laravel: Learn how to build secure, scalable, and modern web applications using PHP Laravel, following MVC architecture and best practices.
